[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” pix_overlay_color=”blue” pix_overlay_opacity=”0.95″ el_id=”pix_section_submit” css=”.vc_custom_1647950895886{background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bottom_divider_select=”dynamic” bottom_moving_divider_color=”%5B%7B%22d_color_1%22%3A%22%23f8f9fa%22%2C%22d_color_2%22%3A%22%23f8f9fa%22%7D%5D” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1648020076852{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1646389627102{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”160px”][vc_single_image image=”33604″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”]

Welcome to the place where the mind is free and opportunities are huge.

40+ Centers in India | 30000+Students Trained | 22000+Students Placement

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
Join Our Team
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646395339388{padding-top: 50px !important;background-color: #f8f5ff !important;}” el_id=”pix_section_about”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
1st Digital Marketing Multi-Million Dollar Training Company

Raised $3.6 MN funding with HT Media

[vc_empty_space height=”12px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”33931″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”12px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”10″ t_has_animation=”true” t_1_color=”#f8f5ff” t_2_is_gradient=”true” t_2_color=”#e6dbff” t_2_animation=”fade-in-up” t_3_is_gradient=”true” t_3_color=”#ffffff” t_3_color_2=”#f6f2ff” t_3_animation=”fade-in-up” css=”.vc_custom_1647952142360{padding-top: 220px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}” t_2_delay=”150″ t_3_delay=”300″ el_id=”pix_section_facts”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
Culture at Digiperform
[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Building great careers

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1648022496131{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

If you wish to build a great career and not just find a job, then Digiperform is the best place for you. We always ensure our people get exciting career paths.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Inspiring women at work

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1648022544091{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

We offer a diversity-friendly working environment and policies that encourage women in achieving their dreams and making a difference in life with their work.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Fun with responsibility

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1648022582143{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

We believe in filling every moment with fun and frolic. However, along with fun we also keep in mind our responsibilities towards the world.

link=”https://digiperform.in/backup/digiperform-placement/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1646397039982{margin-top: -65px !important;}”]

Why Become A Digiperformer ?
[vc_column_text] Our employees are our greatest asset. And we help them to grow beyond their KRA’S

Want to share ideas and views? We encourage everyone to share opinions. It helps us to grow faster.

Everyone is a foodie at Digiperform. We love people who work & eat together.[/vc_column_text]

View Vacancies
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-1″ pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_pt“:“20“,“pix_res_sm_pb“:“20“,“pix_res_md_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pb“:“40“}” css=”.vc_custom_1648029670919{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}” el_id=”pix_section_overview” section_name=”Overview” fade_in_intro=”185″][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-150px“}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_empty_space]
Skills that we constantly hire for
At Digiperform, we turn visions into reality. Our aim is to impart digital skill training to a million people enabling them to be self-employed or get placed in top organizations. Start thinking innovative and become a part of Asia’s Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education. Freedom to grow is a fundamental right of everyone. At Digiperform We believe in nurturing talent, investing in the growth and development of employees, and staying a step ahead of the curve. We offer you career, not job that is limited only by your ambition. We unite as a team to work on the philosophy of trust, simplicity, and transparency.
[vc_column_text]

 Center Head

 Education counselors

 Sales Executive

 Digital Marketing Trainer

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Apply Now

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
